items.text: Saifuddin aims an ugly smear into the leg side. The timing's not there, but it's placed well enough for them to hustle two
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 runs

items.text: pushed across the left hander, and it just keeps going with the arm. Saifuddin misses his cut, and it's quite wide ... but not quite wide enough to be called as such
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: we have a review from New Zealand, for an lbw shout. Saifuddin walked right across to the off side and set himself for a paddle sweep, but missed and was struck in the pad. Umpire Reiffel wasn't convinced, but Williamson has a punt. But Ultra Edge shows some contact of bat on ball, so the decision stands. Not out
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.preText: Naseef: "@Shorif Uddin: One must not forget Mustafiz and his cutters and what our skipper can do on a slow pitch!! But first we need at least 250 on the board!!"
items.text: BOOM! Santner has enjoyed a frugal day with the ball, until now. The very last ball of his spell is smeared up and over long on for six. There had just been the one boundary off him until this one. And it's a biggie
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Saifuddin, SIX runs

items.preText: And now here's Ferguson to complete his overs
items.text: tapped down behind square, and they take the fielder on for a quick single
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: around the stumps comes Ferguson, mixing things up with a slower bouncer. Saifuddin can't do anything with it
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.preText: "Despite that six off the last ball of the 45th, only 49 runs scored in 10 overs between the 36th and 45th, for two wickets, with three fours and a six," says ESPNcricinfo's Rajesh S. "Clearly New Zealand's passage of play."
items.text: slapped out to cover point
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: Ferguson steams in and unleashes a bouncer outside off, Saifuddin dropping his hands to let it pass him
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: heaved to cow corner! Not the prettiest stroke, but effective. It was a length delivery angled in to him, so the shot was on. And was well executed
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball, 119km/h, and Saifuddin can't lay bat on it but they steal a single off the pad
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 leg bye

items.preText: Four overs left. Who will bowl them? Boult's back from the Vauxhall End
items.text: and he starts with a yorker, on his toes, that's dug out into the leg side
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.preText: Joynul: "That's the first six of the match, in'nt? " -- Yep, it was
items.text: Mosaddek holes out! He was hoping to take that six count to two, but he got rather too underneath this attempted loft down the ground. It's Guptill who settles under it at long on, and he makes no mistake. Another Bangladesh batsman trudges off, having failed to really get going
items.shortText: Boult to Mosaddek Hossain, OUT

dismissal.text: Mosaddek Hossain c Guptill b Boult 11 (40m 22b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

items.preText: Andrew Aitken-F: "Santner completing the Vettori 10 - legend in the making. Now if Boult could reward my fantasy team selection, I'd be grateful."
items.text: slower ball, a cutter at 119km/h, and it's pushed to cover for one
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: Mehidy is greeted with a short ball first up, and he dead-bats it towards point to get off the mark, and off strike
items.shortText: Boult to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText: Shorif Uddin : "@Naseef, I am currently dreaming about 265! But, while writing this Mosaddek has gone! That's how my day's has been going :( "
items.text: full, straight and it's clipped out to deep square leg
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.preText: MVelhal: "Looking at the quality and length of the NZ batting line-up, I can say that they will chase down whatever target they are set today within 40 overs. B'desh simply do not have enough quality bowlers."
items.text: Mehidy walks across to off to change the angle up, but the best he can do is a flick down to fine leg
items.shortText: Boult to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText: Here's Henry. He's got two left
items.text: he offers up a touch of width outside off, Mehidy slashing out behind square, just wide of third man
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: dug in short, Mehidy wafting a ramp-cut at it but hitting nothing
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: Stuart: "This will be a tricky chase, Bangladesh bowled superbly against South Africa "
items.text: short of a good length, Mehidy slugging it out to wide long on, off the back foot. And they're back for the second
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.preText: Josh is soaking up the atmosphere at The Oval: "Sat at long on (as a lone kiwi in a sea of green) where the last catch was made, joy to despair at the sight of the ball sailing through the air. These Bangladeshi fans know how to support their team!"
items.text: Mehidy walks way over to the off side before the ball is bowled, but he can't get this yorker past short fine leg
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: Saifuddin rifles a cut, but straight to the point fielder. How many times have Bangladesh hit the field today?
items.shortText: Henry to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: again Mehidy walks right across to off, but this time Henry follows him. He misses with the scoop over fine leg, but Latham can't stop it cleanly behind the stumps, and they sneak through
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 bye

items.text: Mehidy flashes wildly at one that goes across him, hitting fresh air. Is it reversing? Looks like it
items.shortText: Boult to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: Limo: "NZ saved at least 30 runs with excellent fielding " -- Although Bangladesh have aided that by helpfully hit the ball straight to fielders
items.text: edged, and gone! Boult followed the full, wide one up with a quick bouncer. Mehidy had advanced down the track, and wasn't in any position to pull. A feathered edge flies through to Latham, and Boult has his second
items.shortText: Boult to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c †Latham b Boult 7 (9m 9b 0x4 0x6) SR: 77.77

items.text: full and quick at 138km/h, Mashrafe off the mark with a clip off the toes
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run
